import { React, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; import "./styles/Nav.css"; import Listmov from "../commons/Listmov"; const Nav = ({ handle }) => { const search = useInput(); const [movies, setMovies] = useState([]); const HandleMovies = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .get(`https://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=959ee6fb&s=${search.value}`) .then((res) => res.data) .then((mov) => setMovies(mov.Search)); }; return (
Peliculas favoritas Usuarios logueados
{" "}
Cerrar cesion
); }; export default Nav; /*
